histogram.name: ConnectivityDetector.ConnectionState.{Client}
histogram.summary: Result of the connection state after the HTTP Probe made by connectivity detector finishes and the connection state is updated.

histogram.name: ConnectivityDetector.DefaultHttpProbeResult.{Client}
histogram.summary: Result of the HTTP Probe made by connectivity detector. Recorded everytime the probe to the default URL completes (in either success or failure) or timeouts.

histogram.name: ConnectivityDetector.FallbackHttpProbeResult.{Client}
histogram.summary: Result of the HTTP Probe made by connectivity detector. Recorded everytime the probe to the fallback URL completes (in either success or failure) or timeouts.

histogram.name: ConnectivityDetector.SentHttpProbe.{Client}
histogram.summary: Count of times when a HTTP Probe was made by connectivity detector.

histogram.name: DataUse.AppTabState
histogram.summary: Records the data use of Chrome user traffic by the foregound vs. background state of the app and tab.

histogram.name: DataUse.BytesReceived3.Delegate
histogram.summary: Count of total bytes received by the Chrome on the network, as reported by the network delegate. This is recorded when requests complete.

histogram.name: DataUse.BytesSent3.Delegate
histogram.summary: Count of total bytes sent by the Chrome on the network, as reported by the network delegate. With network servicification this is recorded when requests complete.

histogram.name: DataUse.ContentType.UserTrafficKB
histogram.summary: Data use of user traffic by different content types. Recorded in KB when network bytes are received by Chrome.

histogram.name: DataUse.TrafficSize.User
histogram.summary: The total amount of data use of Chrome for user traffic. This traffic has content::ResourceRequestInfo attached to its request. If the OS is not Android all the requests are considered foreground.
